name: Synfig Studio Compressed Project
summary: Learn about .SFG files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: SFG files are one of three file formats used by Synfig Studio, along with .SIFZ and SIF. The SFG format was introduced with the release of Synfig Studio 1.0. The format is similar to the SIFZ format but is compressed with zip compression instead of gzip.

description: An SFG file is the file format used by Synfig Studio to save project files. Synfig Studio is a free and open-source 2D animation software that allows users to create high-quality animations using bitmap and vector graphics. SFG file contains all of the information necessary to recreate an animation, including the layers, timing, and keyframes for each layer. It also includes any images or assets used in the project, as well as any audio tracks or other media.

A SFG file is a compressed project created by Synfig Studio, an open source application used to create professional 2D animations. It contains a .SIF animation file, but also includes the project's assets such as embedded images, audio, etc., and is compressed with Zip compression.
